00019 #endif
00020 const double k2Pi     = 2 * kPi;                        
00021 const double kDeg2Rad = kPi / 180.0;                    
00022 const double kRad2Deg = 180.0 / kPi;

00065 #ifdef __win__
00066 inline int    between(int x, int bot, int top)
00067 {
00068   int res = bot < x ? x : bot;
00069   res = top > x ? x : top;
00070   return res;
00071 }
00072 #else
00073  inline int    between(int x, int bot, int top)           { return std::max(bot, std::min(top, x)); }
00074 #endif
00075 
00076

00087 #ifdef __win__
00088 inline double between(double x, double bot, double top)
00089 {
00090   double res = bot < x ? x : bot;
00091   res = top > x ? x : top;
00092   return res;
00093 }
00094 #else
00095  inline double between(double x, double bot, double top) { return std::max(bot, std::min(top, x)); }

00099 #define ByteSwap(x) ByteSwapX((unsigned char *) &x,sizeof(x))
00100 
00107 inline void ByteSwapX(unsigned char *b, int n)
00108 {
00109      register int i = 0;
00110      register int j = n - 1;
00111      while (i<j) {
00112           std::swap(b[i], b[j]);
00113           i++;
00114           j--;
00115      }
00116 }

00118 // Plattform Dependent
00119 // Must define own isnan since cmath undefines it. This macro is
00120 // copied from /usr/include/architecture/ppc/math.h
00121 #ifdef __CYGWIN__
00122 #define isnan(x) (isnan(x))
00123 #elif __sun__
00124 #define isnan(x) (isnan(x))
00125 #elif __win__
00126 #include <float.h>
00127 #define isnan(x) (_isnan(x))
00128 #else
00129 #define isnan(x) (isnan(x))
00130 #endif
